info.name: Outlook Move Page Navigation
info.description: Moved page navigation buttons to give an additional line of vertical space. Page Navigation wastes screen space when attempting to sort through a large inbox. I wanted to keep the navigation but relocate it to some free white space. See screenshots for the visual changes.
info.additionalInfo:
2015.11.06
-Increased width from 240px to 250px to correct arrows overflowing the container element
